title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for considering R(3) and D(3)

1 point is earned for the answer and reason

R(3)-D(3) = -0.313632 < 0

Since R(3) < D(3) , the amount of water in the pipe is decreasing at time t=3 hours.
